Texts.Eng: Here you go, Captain. Your Vha'leihan Spear has been fully restored. It was an honour to work on such a mighty weapon.

Unfortunately, I don't have the materials needed for the repairs... We'll need at least ^orange;10 Superb Kavanite Plates ^white;to mend the blade, and a piece of ^orange;Centensian Tech ^white;to fix the connection between the weapon and the Shard. ^green;Can you go and find those, Captain?
